sentences.sContent: Bring the soup to the boil and allow it to simmer gently for about half an hour.
sentences.sCn: 把汤煮开，然后用文火炖半小时左右。

synos.tran: 炖；即将沸腾的状态；即将发作

phrases.pCn: 被煮浓；冷静下来；被总括起来

trans.tranOther: to boil gently, or to cook something slowly by boiling it gently

trans.tranCn: 炖；即将沸腾的状态；即将发作
